ovdesc.p: This screen is used to maintain the Bank charges(Inbound Our and Outbound Our) in the payments hub.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or reverse a record in store table, PPL.CHARGES

Redirect Fee is a fee type introduced to capture fee when a payment is redirected. It is a conditional fee type and is applied only when payment direction is “R”(Redirect)

When processing a redirect payment with charge option BEN or SHA, if the redirect fee needs to be taken from the Sending Bank, then, Redirect fee needs to be defined as part of the Sending Bank Charges. If it is to be taken from the Receiving Bank, then, it needs to be defined as part of the Receiving Bank Charges. If Redirect Fee is defined for both Sending and Receiving bank, then, Sending bank definition will take precedence.

When processing a redirect payment with charge option OUR, charges of sending and receiving bank will be summed up and used. In this case, if any fee is defined for both sending and receiving bank, the receiving bank fee will be the final fee that is used. This applies to any fee type and not restricted to Redirect Fee.
